phrase1.text: Creating with meaning is the only path that has value.
phrase1.author: — Mario Rivera V.

phrase2.text: Businesses should exist to serve, not to take advantage
phrase2.author: — Grant Cardone

curriculum.paragraph: I'm an application and web developer. Here you can see my education (DAM), my stack (React, Node/Express, AWS, AI), and real projects I've worked on. If you'd like to evaluate my skills in detail, take a look at my portfolio or download my CV.

footer.headline: What if your <pink>idea</pink> becomes the next <blue>success</blue> case?
